alert.note: Alert for Elko; Eureka; White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 21 at 3:07PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An active pattern brings slow-moving and training showers to much of Elko County... An active pattern continues into the start of this week. Tuesday in particular is on track to see slow-moving and training showers and thunderstorms over portions of Elko County. Rivers and creeks are already running at elevated levels, and multiple Flood Warnings and Flood Advisories are already in effect. Any slow-moving and training thunderstorms could result in rainfall totals of up to 0.75" - 1" and exacerbate flooding conditions. Outside of these streams of water, localized flooding in any locations where water typically pools easily or where poor drainage exists may be prone to flash flooding as a result of extensive periods of rainfall. Please exercise caution if encountering any flooded areas or roadways. Turn around, don`t drown!
